message.content:
cs.LG, cs.RO, cs.AI, cs.SY, cs.CV

Reasoning: 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning): The paper proposes a framework for continual learning and explores the relationship between local model-based control and global value function learning. 
- cs.RO (Robotics): The paper applies the proposed framework to complex simulated control tasks, such as humanoid locomotion and dexterous in-hand manipulation. 
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence): The paper discusses exploration and uncertainty estimation in value function approximation, which are important topics in AI. 
- cs.SY (Systems and Control): The paper focuses on model-based control and trajectory optimization, which are key components of systems and control. 
- cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition): Although not the main focus, the paper mentions using vision-based observations in the simulated control tasks, which could fall under the scope of computer vision.
